title: antarangamellAm
sahitya:
antarangamellAm ariyAyO innum vandenakk-uru tuNai puriyAyO shivanE en


anupallavi

  tam dhimi tOm ena daNDai shalashalakkat-tANDavam ADiDum nI en


caraNam    OyAda kavalaiyai OTTi aruL oLiyinai en kaNmun kATTi
vAyADum vAsalaip-pUTTi mauna mantira dhyAnattirk-kUTTi
tUya nallarivinait-tUNDi ennuLLattil tuLLi vizhAdinit-tuyar manam kaLLattil
tAyAna karuNaikkE sEyena naDatti sattiya shuddha sanmArga nilai perum
